'''David Harvey''' (born [[1946]]) is a New Zealander judge who won the 1980 [[wikipedia:Television New Zealand|TVNZ]] Mastermind Quiz contest with ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' as his specialist subject. He went on to win the International Mastermind competition with the same subject in 1981.<ref>{{webcite|author=David Harvey|articleurl=http://homepages.ihug.co.nz/~djhdcj/TolkienFrame.htm |articlename=David Harvey's Tolkien Page|dated=|website=|accessed=28 December 2014}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=David Harvey|articleurl=http://www.tolkienonline.de/etep/ring_toc.html|articlename=One ring to rule them all|dated=|website=|accessed=28 December 2014}}</ref>

==Book==
*[[1985]]: ''[[The Song of Middle-earth|The Song of Middle-earth: J.R.R. Tolkien's Themes, Symbols and Myth]]''
